projects.type: React ‚Ä¢ Solidty ‚Ä¢ Express ‚Ä¢ Cronjob ‚Ä¢ Cypress ‚Ä¢ Docker
projects.bullets: Utilized a news API and Solidity to create a blockchain infrastructure. This Ethereum-based token system involved writing separate smart contracts for each of the 195 countries. The value of these country-specific tokens fluctuated in real-time based on incoming news with multipliers determined by news categories and current global conditions.

projects.bullets: Allows fitness trainers to connect with clients and showcase their workout routines. The app was built using React Native and TypeScript offering a user-friendly platform for trainers to manage their sessions and for clients to find suitable fitness programs.

projects.type: React Native ‚Ä¢ Node.js ‚Ä¢ Express ‚Ä¢ MongoDB ‚Ä¢ AWS
projects.bullets: Allows users to print QR codes and attach them to items like vehicles and homes. By scanning these QR codes people can access the user's contact information without directly sharing it. This React Native mobile application ensures that users can be reached by nearby individuals in case of need providing a secure and efficient communication method.
